gen:link.msg:message: `RemunerationActivitiesSeniorOfficer` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU6_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU6_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RemunerationMaximumOrHigherIndividualRemunerationSeniorOfficer` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU10_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU10_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Remuneration` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU7_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU7_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`SubtotalRemuneration` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU9_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU9_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`WntInstitutionActivitiesSeniorOfficer` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU8_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsPreviousSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU8_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
